txt.en: You have acquired a piece of socketed equipment. If you find an Essence or Tracery that has a usage level that is less than or equal to your socketed armour, you can apply the Essence to the armour and gain its stats. Traceries may only be applied to Legendary Item sockets, depending on the style of Tracery you have found.\n\nChoose wisely, because Essences may only be removed by using an Essence Reclamation Scroll or from the character panel by paying Mithril Coins.
